meta.description: Neighborhood Fit Quiz question bank with weighted attribute boosts for southeastern Wisconsin
meta.scoring_note: Total Score = sum of (area_attribute_score * answer_attribute_boost * question_weight). Normalize so top area = 100.

scoring.method: For each area, compute: sum of (area_attribute_score * answer_attribute_boost * question_weight) across all answered questions. Normalize the top score to 100.

guardrails.description: If buyer budget is more than 20% below the area's median sale price, downrank by 8 points
If buyer selected 'condo/low-maintenance', uprank condo-friendly areas by 6 points
If buyer answered 'must-have' for lake proximity, exclude areas with lake_access < 2 unless no other matches

scoring.output_note: Return top 3 matches with score, short blurb, and cross-suggestion
